sentence.Network_en: I want us to play hardball on this issue.
sentence.Network_cn: 我希望我们在这个问题上不手软。

sentence.Network_en: She is playing hardball in a world dominated by men 20 years her senior.
sentence.Network_cn: 她在一个由比自己大20岁的男人们主宰的世界里作风强硬。

sentence.Network_en: Another problem is that banks are playing hardball with smaller companies.
sentence.Network_cn: 另外一个问题是目前银行对小企业态度强硬.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 虽然不如本周冠军———《临时教练》(Hardball)那样来势凶猛，激励斗志；排在亚军位置的丽丽-索伯斯基主演的悬疑惊悚片《玻璃屋 …
《Friends》词汇表A ... mentioned vt. 提及, 说起n.提及, 说起v.论及, 提及 hardball n. 硬式棒球 fifteenth adj. 第十五的.
他用硬球（Hardball）或者硬式棒球游戏来形容角逐激烈的政治游戏，认为这是一种彻头彻尾的马基雅维里式的搏击，集中体现了获取 …
10_ffffffffff_新浪博客 ... at large: 未被捕获的、逍遥法外的 hardball: 强硬手段 trace: 跟踪、追踪.

list.abs: Play hard to get 欲擒故纵Play hardball 毫不留情Play havoc 万劫不复
《生活大爆炸》S03E17口语精华：... ... Line in the sand 底线 Play hardball 采取强硬态度 pull out the big gun 出绝招。.
我整理的Action English... ... a truckload of 很多很多很多 play hardball 来硬的 ironclad 包铁甲，铁定.

entry.tran: 采取强硬手段;绝不手软
entry.def: If someone plays hardball, they will do anything that is necessary to achieve or get what they want, even if this involves being harsh or unfair.

example.ex: She is playing hardball in a world dominated by men 20 years her senior.
example.tran: 她在一个由比自己大20岁的男人们主宰的世界里作风强硬。

means.word_mean: 1. a no-nonsense attitude in business or politics;

list.explanation: 破坏、毁坏、损害(某人或某事物)，给(某人或某事物)制造麻烦

example.en: If you drive badly, it plays hell with the tyres of your car.
example.zh: 如果你胡乱驾驶，那会损坏你的汽车轮胎。

example.en: Your decision plays hell with all my friends.
example.zh: 你的决定是在给我所有的朋友制造麻烦。

example.en: You shouldn't play hell with me on this matter.
example.zh: 你不应该在这件事上对我大发脾气。

auth_sentence.content: He realised that it desperately needed his services and he played hardball.
auth_sentence.res_content: He realised that it desperately needed his services and he played hardball.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He realised that it desperately needed his services and he played hardball.

auth_sentence.content: At the meeting in Cannes yesterday evening the French and German leaders played hardball.
auth_sentence.res_content: At the meeting in Cannes yesterday evening the French and German leaders played hardball.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: At the meeting in Cannes yesterday evening the French and German leaders played hardball.

auth_sentence.content: But Hungary's would-be rescuers are playing hardball, and walked out of talks in December over the new central bank law.
auth_sentence.res_content: But Hungary's would-be rescuers are playing hardball, and walked out of talks in December over the new central bank law.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But Hungary's would-be rescuers are playing hardball, and walked out of talks in December over the new central bank law.
